name: Friends of Figma Community Passport
description:
Join us in the browser. Grab your Passport! ðŸ’³


Friends of Figma is that global community where you can find all those Figmates that like you are into Figma, design, technology, culture, pets,... you name it!


But how can we all get to know each other.

Where are we? Who are we? What superpoers we've got?

Enter the Figma Community Passport, where you'll let everyone know everything, or nothing, about you.


But wait, there's 2 parts to this Passport:

  1. Build it: Just duplicate this file, personalize your very own passport and publish it in the Community so everyone gets to know you.
  2. Share it: After you're done with the passport, pick your thumbnail and drop it into the Friend of Figma Atlas or just share yoru passport on social, we've got you covered.


And we know you may be wondering â€œwhats the difference between the companion file and the Friends of Figma passport and atlas?

  • The companion is unique to Config Europe and intended to help you connect to people at the conference - its NEXT WEEK (September 17)
  • The passport and Atlas will live on waaaaaaaay past next week. You can use it as you go to events - whether it be Config or user groups or livestreams! The passport is a living doc, keep adding to it and sharing it as it becomes full!


And that's it! You can now enjoy your day.


Oh wait! Please make sure you say hi to everyone involved in this project.

Just make sure you're in the Friends of Figma Slack channel and you can thank these FoF Community Advocates yourself:


  • Bruno Figueiredo, FoF Portugal
  • Frank Paradiso, FoF Rome & Milan
  • Hakeem Olasupo, FoF Lagos
  • Mirko Santangelo, FoF Rome & Milan
  • Thomas Ewart, FoF Austin & Oslo
